name: nytevibe
description: Real-time venue tracker for nightlife enthusiasts
author: nYtevibe Team

scripts.component: echo 'Usage: npm run component <ComponentName>' && read -p 'Component name: ' name && mkdir -p src/components/${name} && touch src/components/${name}/${name}.jsx
scripts.hook: echo 'Usage: npm run hook <hookName>' && read -p 'Hook name: ' name && touch src/hooks/${name}.js
scripts.analyze:bundle: npm run build && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/assets/*.js
